song.lyrics:
Harbor bell through evening mist Waves slap docks where no ship exists Chain drops with rusty twist Night watch keeps its lonely list
Wave crash (echo crash crash) Moon hides (echo hides hides) Harbor keeps its ancient tryst Wind sings through metal grist
Compass spins with nowhere left Chart shows reefs we've long since missed Drink up this empty chest Yo ho ho through midnight mist
[Foghorn blast]
